pr_title: [Metrics][LOG] Add metrics for compaction permits and log for merge rowsets

timeline.bodyText: There is "LOG_EVERY_N" macro for this purpose
timeline.author: morningman

replies.bodyText:
There is "LOG_EVERY_N" macro for this purpose

OK.
replies.author: weizuo93

replies.bodyText:
There is "LOG_EVERY_N" macro for this purpose

"LOG_EVERY_N" will print a message after "LOG_EVERY_N" is executed n times. After test，"LOG_EVERY_N" macro is for all compaction threads，it means  a message will be printed after n rows merged for all compaction tasks. But we need a message after n rows merged for a particular compaction task.
replies.author: weizuo93

timeline.message: add metrics for compaction permits and log for compaction merge
add metrics for compaction permits and log for compaction merge
